subject: Hockey, Ice
Sports Injuries
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Joey Hishon has joined Colorado after overcoming two concussions and a groin injury. Not to mention the broken foot and sprained knee injuries he sustained earlier in his career.
snippet: Joey Hishon has joined Colorado after overcoming two concussions and a groin injury. Not to mention the broken foot and sprained knee injuries he sustained earlier in his career.
